entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as the one who comes leaping into view, dragging a bedsheet. He is described as yelling and bellowing to get everyone's attention.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as the one who is staring at Ron in bewilderment. She is described as looking utterly bewildered and trembling with fear.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who looks down at the sheet Ron is holding, describing what he sees.

relationships.description: Ron yelled at Hermione to look at something on the bedsheet. This is described as Ron shaking the sheets in her face.
Ron showed Harry what was on the bedsheet, which looked like blood. This is described as Ron holding up the sheet for Harry to see.
Ron told Hermione that something was on the floor, but she didn't know what it was. This is described as Ron yelling into the stunned silence.
